refsect1.title: Summary
refsect1.para: The multiply operator performs matrix multiplication on two input matrices and returns a result matrix.
Both inputs must be compatible for the multiply operation, and both must have a single numeric attribute.

If m, n, and p represent integers, to be compatible for multiplication, two matrices must have dimensions as follows: if left_array has dimensions m×n, then right_array must have dimensions n×p, and the result array will have dimensions m×p.

informalexample.para: This example multiplies a 3×2 array and a 2×3 array.
